gale:repo.gale:text: a Java-based authoring tool that allows the creation of high level DM/AM models using a GUI to draw a graph of concepts and relations

The Graph Author was developed by Brendan Rousseau, a student at the TU/e. It is a high level DM/AM authoring tool that allows most authors to create their adaptive application without ever writing any AHA! rules, as seen in the [[concept-editor|concept editor]]. The tool generates these rules based on [[templates|template code]] associated with relations.
